name: rotcom
author: RWCox
description: Prints to stdout the 4x3 transformation matrix+vector that would be applied by 3drotate to the given dataset.

inputs.description: Combination of rotate and ashift options in a single quoted string (e.g., '-rotate 10I 0R 0A -ashift 5S 0 0')
inputs.name: Rotate and Ashift Options

inputs.description: Input dataset for determining coordinate order
inputs.name: Input Dataset
